scripts.build: npm run build:select && npm run build:elements && npm run build:extensions && npm run build:material && npm run build:popperjs
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map elements/**/*.d.ts elements/**/*.d.ts.map popperjs/**/*.d.ts popperjs/**/*.d.ts.map material/**/*.d.ts material/**/*.d.ts.map extensions/**/*.d.ts extensions/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:select && npm run doc:generate:elements && npm run doc:generate:extensions && npm run doc:generate:material && npm run doc:generate:popperjs && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-select" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:select: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-select && npm run doc:json:select && npm run doc:md:select
scripts.doc:md:select: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/ng-select && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:elements: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-select-elements && npm run doc:json:elements && npm run doc:md:elements
scripts.doc:md:elements: api-documenter markdown -i elements/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-select-elements && rimraf elements/temp
scripts.doc:generate:extensions: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-select-extensions && npm run doc:json:extensions && npm run doc:md:extensions
scripts.doc:md:extensions: api-documenter markdown -i extensions/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-select-extensions && rimraf extensions/temp
scripts.doc:generate:material: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-select-material && npm run doc:json:material && npm run doc:md:material
scripts.doc:md:material: api-documenter markdown -i material/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-select-material && rimraf material/temp
scripts.doc:generate:popperjs: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-select-popperjs && npm run doc:json:popperjs && npm run doc:md:popperjs
scripts.doc:md:popperjs: api-documenter markdown -i popperjs/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-select-popperjs && rimraf popperjs/temp
